DOC.brief_summary: Various bacterial organisms will be tested in order to compile information regarding the effectiveness of tigecycline against certain bacteria seen in local communities.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Local Susceptibility Patterns Associated With Tigecycline in Comparison to Other Antibiotics
DOC.detailed_description: This is a prospective, microbiologic in vitro evaluation which will study the susceptibility of tigecycline in disk diffusion on clinical bacterial isolates collected from inpatients and outpatients. Fourteen hospital centers participated in the program. In vitro efficacy of tigecycline will be determined through the in vitro disk diffusion activity, using FDA breakpoints.
DOC.criteria: Any protocolspecified microorganism isolated from the samples collected from hospitalized patients and outpatients
